loading.title: Loading your suggestions...
loading.subtitle: We are preparing the most suitable suggestions for you.

stats.title: Your Suggestions
stats.subtitle: Each suggestion is an opportunity carefully selected for you by our team.

main.title: Manage Suggestions
main.errorLoading: An error occurred while loading suggestions: {error}

dialogs.approveDescription: Approving a suggestion is an exciting step. Are you sure you want to proceed? After confirmation, the matchmaker will be notified and will continue the process for you.
dialogs.declineDescription: Every answer moves you forward. Are you sure you want to decline this suggestion? Your feedback is very important and will help us refine the search for you.

toasts.errorDescription: Try refreshing the page or contact support.
toasts.newSuggestionsDescription: Check out the new suggestions waiting for you.
toasts.approvedFirstPartyDesc: With your approval, the suggestion has been sent to the other party. If they also approve, your contact details will be exchanged.
toasts.approvedSecondPartyDesc: Great! Now that you've both approved, your contact details will be sent to the first party, and theirs to you.
toasts.declinedDesc: Thank you for the feedback - it helps us provide better matches.
toasts.matchmakerNotified: The matchmaker will be notified and will proceed with the process.
toasts.refreshSuccessDescription: All suggestions have been updated to the current state.

card.whySpecial: Why is this a special match?
card.reasonTeaserDefault: The matchmaker identified special potential worth exploring!
card.clickForDetails: Click for full details and more insights

buttons.approveDisabledTooltip: Cannot approve a new suggestion while another is in an active process.

header.title: An Offer Chosen Especially For You
header.subtitleLine1: We thought of you when we saw this profile.
header.subtitleLine2: We believe there's a real foundation here for a meaningful connection.
header.matchStorySubtitle1: We listen to what's important to you, even between the lines.
header.matchStorySubtitle2: Here are some of the connections we identified.
header.whyYou: Why this is a fit for you:
header.whatsNextTitle: What Now? The Decision is Yours
header.whatsNextSubtitle1: Every decision you make is the right step on your journey.
header.whatsNextSubtitle2: Take your time, and choose what feels right to you.

actions.titleExpanded: âœ¨ This is the key moment - what's your decision?
actions.subtitle: Every decision is a new opportunity
actions.decline: ğŸ˜” Not for me right now
actions.reminder: Remember: Every decision moves us one step closer to finding your perfect match.

profile.loadingDescription: This might take a few seconds
profile.errorDescription: We couldn't load the profile. Please contact the matchmaker for assistance.

aiAnalysisCta.title: ğŸ”® Want a Deeper Look?
aiAnalysisCta.description: Our smart AI can analyze all the data and provide you with professional insights on connection potential, strengths, and even conversation starters.

aiAnalysis.loadingDescription: We are examining dozens of parameters to provide you with a comprehensive and accurate picture.
aiAnalysis.errorAlertDescription: We apologize for the issue. Please try again or contact support.

considerTab.title: Points for Thought and Open Conversation

aiAnalysis.noteText: Remember, this analysis is a tool and a recommendation only. It's designed to highlight points for thought and spark conversation. True chemistry and deep connection are formed in human interaction.

emptyState.noResultsDescription: Try changing your search or filter criteria to find what you're looking for.
emptyState.noHistoryDescription: When you have completed suggestions, they will appear here.
emptyState.noActiveDescription: Our matchmakers are currently working on finding the perfect matches for you.

controls.searchPlaceholder: Search by name, city, or profession...

rationale.title: A Special Suggestion For You
rationale.personalNoteTitle: Why I thought this is a great fit for you
rationale.noReasonText: The matchmaker trusts the data to speak for itself.

compatibility.mainSubtitle: An in-depth analysis of connection points and potential challenges
compatibility.errorDescription: One or more profiles are incomplete, so a detailed compatibility analysis cannot be performed.
compatibility.noDataDescription: Not enough shared information was found to perform a detailed compatibility analysis.

askMatchmaker.title: Question for {{name}}
askMatchmaker.description: The matchmaker is available to answer any questions you have about the candidate.
askMatchmaker.errorSubmitting: An error occurred while sending the question. Please try again later.

topicSelect.title: What topic are you interested in?
topicSelect.subtitle: Select a category to get sample questions

input.label: Your Question
input.placeholder: Write your question here... The matchmaker will be happy to help and respond.
input.info: The question will be sent directly to the matchmaker.

values.label: Values & Beliefs
values.description: Questions about worldview and value system
questions: Is there anything important to know about their worldview?
How much importance do they place on religious topics?
Do they have any red lines on matters of belief?
How do they see the role of tradition in daily life?

family.label: Family & Background
family.description: Questions about family and personal background
questions: How would you describe their family?
Are there important things to know about the family?
What is important to them regarding building a family?
What is their relationship with their extended family like?

career.label: Career & Studies
questions: What are their long-term professional plans?
Are they interested in a career change?
How do they see the balance between career and family?
What fields are they interested in for further study?

personality.label: Character & Temperament
personality.description: Questions about personality and character traits
questions: How would you describe their character?
What are their strongest traits?
Is there anything worth knowing about their temperament?
How do they handle stress and challenges?

future.label: Future Plans
future.description: Questions about vision and future plans
questions: What are their long-term dreams?
Do they have plans to move?
What is their vision for family life?
How do they see their life in 10 years?

other.label: Other Question
other.description: A specific question or another topic
questions: I have a specific question...

inquiryThread.title: Conversation with the Matchmaker
inquiryThread.subtitle: Ask questions and get professional answers
inquiryThread.loadingError: An error occurred while loading inquiries

emptyState.title: Start a Conversation with the Matchmaker
emptyState.description: Have questions about the candidate? The matchmaker is here to help.

toasts.sendSuccessDescription: The matchmaker will be notified and will get back to you soon.

timeline.title: Suggestion Timeline
timeline.subtitle: Track the progress of the suggestion over time

emptyState.title: No History Available
emptyState.description: No actions have been taken on this suggestion yet.

DRAFT.label: Draft
DRAFT.description: The suggestion is being prepared by the matchmaker.

PENDING_FIRST_PARTY.label: Pending Party 1
PENDING_FIRST_PARTY.description: Awaiting approval from the first party.

FIRST_PARTY_APPROVED.label: Party 1 Approved
FIRST_PARTY_APPROVED.description: The first party approved. Awaiting the second party.

FIRST_PARTY_DECLINED.label: Party 1 Declined
FIRST_PARTY_DECLINED.description: The first party declined the suggestion.

PENDING_SECOND_PARTY.label: Pending Party 2
PENDING_SECOND_PARTY.description: Awaiting approval from the second party.

SECOND_PARTY_APPROVED.label: Party 2 Approved
SECOND_PARTY_APPROVED.description: The second party approved. Awaiting the next step.

SECOND_PARTY_DECLINED.label: Party 2 Declined
SECOND_PARTY_DECLINED.description: The second party declined the suggestion.

AWAITING_MATCHMAKER_APPROVAL.label: Awaiting Matchmaker
AWAITING_MATCHMAKER_APPROVAL.description: Both parties approved, awaiting matchmaker's final approval.

CONTACT_DETAILS_SHARED.label: Contact Details Shared
CONTACT_DETAILS_SHARED.description: Contact details have been exchanged. Good luck!

AWAITING_FIRST_DATE_FEEDBACK.label: Awaiting Feedback
AWAITING_FIRST_DATE_FEEDBACK.description: The meeting took place, awaiting feedback.

THINKING_AFTER_DATE.label: Thinking
THINKING_AFTER_DATE.description: One or both parties are considering the next step.

PROCEEDING_TO_SECOND_DATE.label: Proceeding to 2nd Date
PROCEEDING_TO_SECOND_DATE.description: Both parties are interested in a second date.

ENDED_AFTER_FIRST_DATE.label: Ended After 1st Date
ENDED_AFTER_FIRST_DATE.description: The connection will not continue after the first meeting.

MEETING_PENDING.label: Scheduling Meeting
MEETING_PENDING.description: The parties are in the process of scheduling a meeting.

MEETING_SCHEDULED.label: Meeting Scheduled
MEETING_SCHEDULED.description: A first meeting has been scheduled.

MATCH_APPROVED.label: Match Approved
MATCH_APPROVED.description: The match was approved by the matchmaker. The process is moving forward.

MATCH_DECLINED.label: Match Declined
MATCH_DECLINED.description: The match was declined by the matchmaker.

MARRIED.label: Married
MARRIED.description: Mazel Tov! The couple got married.

EXPIRED.label: Expired
EXPIRED.description: The time to decide on the suggestion has passed.
